name: Undertale: A Date With Papyrus BETA
name_original: Undertale: A Date With Papyrus BETA
description:
The magnificent Papyrus wants to take you on a date! Tour his house, learn about his interests, and engage in one-on-one combat to see who has more date power...

Controls: WASD to move; Enter to interact/progress through dialogue. 

Inspired by Toby Fox's hit RPG Undertale, "A Date with Papyrus" is a clone made to showcase the original game's art style, characters, and narrative mechanics. Created for NYU's Intermediate Game Development course by Jade Wang, Maria Roxas, and Cara Outar.
